column5: Thanks to dan and mike I made a few modifications to it. I added springs to it Its still in bare form, but I added a few extras for a visuall The reels are going to used temporarily for this season. Next season I may go with auto retrieve reels
In the first pics, thats the stub cover that I have plans for in the near future The next pic I had to mount it and get a visuall as to height etc. I may paint it, or polish it, not sure yet.
Nice Job Vince - you'll get a good spread out with that.

Does anyone here on the board know where you could have the thing powder coated cheap or for swop work? There’s more then one reason they call us tradesmen; bartering is the best way of beating the tax man and it’s legal. LOL  Dan.
